item.title: Goals 2023
item.description: Goals that I wish to accomplish by 2023 1. Get to Ideal Weight Thanks to my sedentary lifestyle, I am currently 10 Kg overweight.

item.title: My Desk Setup
item.description: What is on my Desk? I have always been a sucker for good desk setups, and I have wanted one ever since I saw MKBHD's youtube video.

item.title: Causes
item.description: Free Code Camp I have personally used FreeCodeCamp, and I have benefitted a lot from its tutorials and blog posts. I sincerely believe they provide quality education for free.

item.title: Organizing a Hackathon During Covid Pandemic
item.description: You just fight to live another day. Just after completing my term as an Innovation Committee Lead for ITDP Hyderabad, I got an opportunity to work with the DELL TIDE Hackathon team.

item.title: Ipl Analytics
item.description: Overview We’ve all been engulfed by the uncertainty that is COVID-19. It doesn’t seem to be going anywhere anytime soon.

item.title: 5 Leadership Lessons From My Personal Experience
item.description: It is not the genius at the top giving directions that makes people great. It is great people that make the guy at the top look like a genius.

item.title: Perfection Is Overrated
item.description: Practice makes Perfect I have a confession to make, I have been writing and re-writing this post for over two months now.

item.title: Impossible List
item.description: We all die. The goal isn’t to live forever, the goal is to create something that will. For all of you who are wondering what an impossible list is, let me borrow a few sentences from Thomas Frank who was my inspiration for creating my own Impossible list.
